description:
Honoka and Bogie pick up the long-awaited PSP from Zankan. Just after parting ways, she senses an alarming presence pass overhead. It`s the Auto-Enforcer "Blue Breaker," whose name is synonymous with terror -- and it`s heading right toward her friends.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 蒼い殺戮者(ブルー・ブレイカー)
